# beads-skill

> **Note:** This skill has moved to [github.com/sttts/skills](https://github.com/sttts/skills) and will be maintained there going forward.

Claude Code plugin for [beads](https://github.com/sttts/beads) issue tracking workflow.

## Installation

```bash
# Add the marketplace
/plugin marketplace add sttts/beads-skill

# Install the plugin
/plugin install beads
```

## What it does

This plugin provides a skill that activates when your project has a `.beads` directory. It guides Claude through:

- Running `bd prime` at session start
- Checking ready tasks with `bd ready --pretty`
- Creating tasks and epics with sensible ID conventions
- Managing task state (in-progress, closed)
- PR/MR URL labeling on tasks
- Worktree management for epics
- Session completion workflow (the "landing the plane" checklist)

## Trigger phrases

The skill activates when you mention:
- "bd", "beads"
- "what's next"
- "add task", "add epic"
- Issue tracking related queries

It will first check for a `.beads` directory - if not present, the skill does not apply.

## Requirements

- [beads](https://github.com/sttts/beads) CLI installed
- A project with a `.beads` directory
